description:
Peruvian President Jose Jeri was removed from office on February 17, 2026. The Peruvian legislature is expected to elect a new head of congress on Wednesday, February 18 who will then assume the office of the Presidency (see: https://www.reuters.com/world/china/perus-congress-begins-debating-removal-president-jeri-2026-02-17/).

This market will resolve according to the next individual to formally assume the office of the President in Peru in accordance with Peruvian succession procedure.

Interim Presidents will count, including any individual who assumes the office of the President after being selected by the Peruvian Legislature.

If no individual has assumed the office of the President by April 12, 2026, 11:59 PM ET, this market will resolve to “Other”.

The resolution sources for this market will be official information from the government of Peru and a consensus of credible reporting.

events.title: Next President of Peru?

question: Will José María Balcazar be the next President of Peru?
